page.title: 01AREA AROUND CRICK AND KILSBY
page.content: Our area is in Northamptonshire and contains two villages : Kilsby and Crick. As we live in the countryside there is more farmland than anything else. The agricultural area is mostly grazing land with pockets of cultivated grass and crops. There are two important roads transversing the area: the A5 and the M1 motorway. We also have a railway which goes from Birmingham to London. The Oxford Union canal passes through Crick. An important historical feature is the site of the old Roman Road (Watling Street) which also crosses the square.
